text:
Zdravko Tomac (24 May 1937 – 4 January 2020) was a Croatian politician. He was born in Garčin. He was a member of the League of Communists until 1991, when he joined the Social Democratic Party (SDP). He served as an MP from 1995 to 2005. He left the SDP in 2003.
On 4 January 2020, Tomac died in Dubrava, Zagreb. He was 82.
